::Hot Rod::

He feels a familiar force.
"The Maximal Matrix...."
He runs out to see Iron Raptor become Arkness Prime.

::Epyon::

He stood next to Hot Rod.
"I though Liono Prime had the Autobot Matrix."

::Hot Rod::

"Its the Maximal Matrix, that the Maximal Council gave me when I came to
this war."
